title: HELP ME PICK!
body:
I play lots of Mid and Jungle plus a few adc games and now i wanna start playing support. 
But i need help i dunno which champ to really but my time and effort into mastering. As the new season has started assasins are the meta so for S7 which support is OP and very Forgiving. I have tried {{champion:412}} {{champion:44}} {{champion:37}} {{champion:16}} . I enjoyed thresh a lot but i think he will require more time to get the hang off. 
Any support champ suggestions?
